content: super-easy to make this colorful crochet blanket is designed to liven up a room stitched in our durable red heart super saver we used full and half square motifs to create a lovely mountain range graphic practice double_crochet chain stitch assembly and single_crochet on this amazing throw that will look vibrant wash after wash it s perfectly sized for snuggling so have it handy on chilly nights yarns for model red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a soft white 0316 3 balls contrast b rosy 0177 2 balls contrast c coral 0726 2 balls contrast d gold 0321 2 balls
